name: Keep an Ear to the Ground
name_original: Keep an Ear to the Ground
description:
In this game you play as a blind Merchant. Your job is to collect treasure as you trek through the darkness using only your echolocation to guide you. You will encounter enemies on your journey who will come for your treasure. Catch up to your caravan with as much treasure as possible for the highest score.

This game was made in one month as part of the Denny's Harvest Foods Discord Server's first game jam. This was our first in-depth experience with Unity.

Programming, Game Design: Sean Miller -- Twitter: @octalCosmonaut

Models & Animations, Level Design, Game Design: Joshua Bounds -- Twitter: @joshuabounds
